title: Techno-economic and environmental analysis of renewable energy integration in irrigation systems: A comparative study of standalone and grid-connected PV/diesel generator systems in Khyber Pakhtunkhwa
content:
Publication date: 30 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 10
